metadata.name: Content Dist
metadata.description: Content distribution platform for social media creators

0.title: Setup Project Repository and Base Structure
0.description: Initialize the project repository with NextJS frontend and Supabase backend structure. Configure basic project settings, dependencies, and CI/CD pipeline. [Task ID: 0]

1.title: Supabase Database Setup and Configuration
1.description: Set up and configure Supabase project for users, brands, projects, content, and subscriptions with proper indexing and performance optimization. [Task ID: 1]

2.title: Supabase Authentication Implementation
2.description: Implement user registration, login, and password recovery using Supabase Auth with both email/password and social login options, including GDPR compliance and role-based access control. [Task ID: 2]

3.title: Authentication UI Components
3.description: Create accessible frontend components for user registration, login, and password recovery with GDPR compliance features. [Task ID: 3]

4.title: Brand Settings Backend Implementation
4.description: Create API endpoints for managing brand assets, color schemes, and stylistic preferences with proper caching and error handling using Supabase. [Task ID: 4]

5.title: Brand Settings UI Components
5.description: Build accessible frontend components for users to manage brand assets and preferences following UI/UX guidelines. [Task ID: 5]

6.title: Tiptap Rich Text Editor Integration
6.description: Integrate and customize the Tiptap rich text editor for accessible content creation with performance optimization. [Task ID: 6]

7.title: Content Creation UI Implementation
7.description: Build the accessible content creation interface with Tiptap editor and platform-specific previews following UI/UX guidelines. [Task ID: 7]

8.title: OpenAI API Integration for Content Conversion
8.description: Implement backend services to convert content for different platforms using OpenAI's API with caching and rate limiting. [Task ID: 8]

9.title: Content Conversion UI Implementation
9.description: Create accessible interface for reviewing and editing AI-generated content versions following UI/UX guidelines. [Task ID: 9]

10.title: Ayrshare API Integration for Social Media Posting
10.description: Implement backend services to post content to multiple platforms via Ayrshare API with error handling and monitoring. [Task ID: 10]

11.title: Posting and Scheduling UI Implementation
11.description: Build accessible interface for posting content immediately or scheduling for future dates following UI/UX guidelines. [Task ID: 11]

12.title: Projects Feature Implementation
12.description: Create backend and frontend components for managing projects with associated brand and platform settings, including role-based access control. [Task ID: 12]

13.title: Dashboard Analytics Implementation
13.description: Implement analytics dashboard with metrics from Ayrshare API and internal data with performance optimization and caching. [Task ID: 13]

14.title: Dashboard UI Components
14.description: Build accessible frontend components for displaying analytics, scheduled posts, and recent activity following UI/UX guidelines. [Task ID: 14]

15.title: Stripe Integration for Payment Processing
15.description: Implement Stripe API integration for handling payments and subscriptions with GDPR compliance and comprehensive error handling. [Task ID: 15]

16.title: Subscription Management UI
16.description: Build accessible frontend components for managing subscription plans and billing information following UI/UX guidelines. [Task ID: 16]

17.title: User Profile Management Implementation
17.description: Create backend and frontend components for managing user profiles and preferences with GDPR compliance and accessibility features. [Task ID: 17]

18.title: Landing Page Implementation
18.description: Design and implement the accessible marketing landing page with platform overview, sign-up forms, and GDPR compliance features. [Task ID: 18]

19.title: System Testing and Deployment Setup
19.description: Implement comprehensive testing, monitoring, and set up deployment pipeline for the application with performance optimization. [Task ID: 19]
